description: Overview of the Kafka Connect cluster

panels.description: Kafka Connect online workers returning metrics.
panels.title: Connect: Online Workers

panels.description: Number of tasks deployed on Kafka Connect cluster.
panels.title: Connect: Sum of Total Tasks

panels.description:
Number of Running Tasks on the Kafka Connect cluster.
            Ideally, this number should be equal to the total number of tasks deployed.
panels.title: Connect: Sum of Running Tasks

panels.description:
Number of Paused Tasks on the Kafka Connect cluster.
            Ideally, this number should be zero, as tasks should be running.
panels.title: Connect: Sum of Paused Tasks

panels.description:
Number of Paused Tasks on the Kafka Connect cluster.
            Ideally, this number should be zero, as tasks should be running.
            It's recommended alerting when this value is higher than 0.
panels.title: Connect: Sum of Failed Tasks

panels.description:
Informative value. Time since last rebalance.
            When this value is continuously and repeatedly low means some connectors are failing and rebalancing is triggered constantly.
panels.title: Connect: Time since last rebalance

panels.description: Connect workers metadata and stats.
panels.title: Connect Workers

panels.description: Connectors deployed and task stats.
panels.title: Connectors

panels.description: How much time the connector tasks are in running state.
panels.title: Tasks Running Ratio

panels.description: Average ime spent on rebalance state.
panels.title: Rebalance Latency (avg.)

panels.description:
Rate of CPU seconds used by the Java process.
            100% usage represents one core. 
            If there are multiple cores, the total capacity should be 100% * number_cores.
panels.title: CPU usage

panels.description: Sum of JVM memory used, without including areas (e.g. heap size).
panels.title: Memory usage

panels.description: Sum of seconds used by Garbage Collection.
panels.title: GC collection

panels.description: Incoming byte rate per second per worker.
panels.title: Incoming Byte Rate

panels.description: Outgoing byte rate per second per worker.
panels.title: Outgoing Byte Rate

panels.description: Fraction of time the I/O thread spent doing I/O
panels.title: IO Ratio

panels.description: Average number of network operations (reads or writes) on all connections per second
panels.title: Network IO Rate

panels.description: Number of active connections
panels.title: Active Connections

panels.description: Successful and failed authentications per second.
panels.title: Rate of Authentication

panels.description: Maximum and average size of the batches processed by the connector task.
panels.title: Batch size

panels.description: Percentage of offset commit successful and failed.
panels.title: Offset commit success/failure

panels.description: Average and Maximum time in milliseconds taken by the task to commit offsets
panels.title: Offset commit latency

panels.description: Total number of failures seen by task.
panels.title: Total Record Failures

panels.description: Total number of errors seen by task.
panels.title: Total Record Error

panels.description: Total number of records skipped seen by task.
panels.title: Total Records Skipped

panels.description: Total number of records logged seen by task.
panels.title: Total Errors Logged

panels.description: Total number of retries seen by task.
panels.title: Total Retries

panels.description: Number of produce requests to dead letter topics.
panels.title: Dead Letter Topic Requests

panels.description: Average and Maximum time in milliseconds taken by this task to poll for a batch of source records
panels.title: Poll Batch Latency

panels.description:
Before transformations are applied, 
            this is the average per-second number of records produced or 
            polled by the task belonging to the named source connector in the worker
panels.title: Source Record Poll Rate

panels.description:
After transformations are applied, 
            this is the average per-second number of records output from the transformations and 
            written to Kafka for the task belonging to the named source connector in the worker 
            (excludes any records filtered out by the transformations)
panels.title: Source Record Write Rate

panels.description:
Before transformations are applied, 
            this is the average per-second number of records read from Kafka 
            for the task belonging to the named sink connector in the worker
panels.title: Sink Record Read Rate

panels.description:
After transformations are applied, 
            this is the average per-second number of records output from the transformations and 
            sent to the task belonging to the named sink connector in the worker 
            (excludes any records filtered out by the transformations)
panels.title: Sink Record Send Rate

panels.description:
Number of topic partitions assigned to the task and 
            which belong to the named sink connector in the worker
panels.title: Partition Count

title: Kafka Connect cluster
